title: Advanced Video Editing Workflows
description: This chapter explores professional video editing techniques, collaboration methods, visual effects, and export optimization.

subtopics.title: External Audio Editing Integration
subtopics.content: Advanced video production often requires precise audio control. Audio tracks can be exported as WAV files, refined using professional audio tools, and re-imported for accurate synchronization on the timeline.

subtopics.title: Editing for Social Media Formats
subtopics.content: Social media platforms require different aspect ratios. Editors use custom profiles to adapt content for vertical and horizontal formats while maintaining proper framing and visual balance.
